title: GPT-3.5 emission per token (Ruf & Mortas)
description:
In the absence of reliable data on the energy consumption of GPT-3.5, this information is extrapolated from the freely available language model Llama 2 7B. The number of parameters in Llama 2 7B is 7 billion, whereas GPT-3.5 has a much larger parameter count of 175 billion.

Therefore, we assume that submitting a query to GPT-3 requires 25x more energy.
